m_szDocTitle: Nuclear Power Too Expensive, French Court Finds | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Nuclear Power Too Expensive, French Court Finds March 26th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     The French Court of Auditors recently found that nuclear power, which France is a leader in, costs more than what electricity consumers in the country are charged. Furthermore, the wind industry there has spoken up to point out that electricity from wind power is cheaper than from new nuclear.
